comments.body: Is it safer to describe this update in the migration guide?
I think it's okay ... I guess ... it was already no-op if somebody sets in runtime and it was documented as a static configuration already too .. I would think this is a bug ..

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +268,272 @@      .doc("Configures a list of JDBC connection providers, which are disabled. " +
        "The list contains the name of the JDBC connection providers separated by comma.")
      .version("3.1.0")
      .stringConf
      .createWithDefault("")
